personalInfo.name: Lan Nguyen
personalInfo.title: Geospatial Analyst | Workflow Automation | Data Management
personalInfo.title_academic: Geospatial Data Analytics | GeoAI | Timeseries Analysis

profile.description: Experienced Geospatial Analyst with 10+ years of experience in GIS & RS, and geospatial data analytics across research and private sectors. Proven expertise in designing innovative solutions, and delivering actionable insights. Proficient in industry-standard tools like ESRI Suite, QGIS, GEE, Python, R. Recognized for impactful publications and a patented innovation, with a proven ability to lead teams and translate technical expertise into actionable, data-driven solutions.
